english: Do not give up, keep going.

spanish: Todo es posible con confianza en ti mismo.
english: Everything is possible with confidence in yourself.

spanish: No hay que desesperarse, hay que esforzarse.
english: There is no need to despair, you just need to work hard.

spanish: Sigue luchando, el éxito te está esperando.
english: Keep fighting, success is waiting for you.

spanish: Ninguna dificultad es imposible para ti.
english: No difficulty is impossible for you.

spanish: Con determinación y esfuerzo, todo es posible.
english: With determination and effort, everything is possible.

spanish: No te detengas ante los obstáculos, sigue avanzando.
english: Do not stop in front of obstacles, keep moving forward.

spanish: Cada día es una oportunidad para mejorar.
english: Every day is an opportunity to improve.
Be persistent and don't give up.

spanish: La paciencia y la constancia te llevarán lejos.
english: Patience and consistency will take you far.
